title: Crime Alert 02.18.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.18.19
description:
Serial killer confesses to 94 murders drawing detailed portraits of his victims to help identify them. Former American idol contestant faces federal charges as a drug mule. A Kentucky man allegedly kidnaps the mother of his child at gunpoint which leads to a car chase and police shootout which kills them both.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
